articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: What Who Official Said On Mass Monkeypox Vaccinations | Mint - Mint
articles.description: Monkeypox: Public health authorities in Europe and North America are investigating over 100 suspected and confirmed cases of the viral infection
articles.content: LONDON: The World Health Organization does not believe the outbreak of monkeypox in Europe and North America requires mass vaccinations as measures like good hygiene and safe sexual behaviour will he… [+671 chars]
